container.dark: border border-grey-9 rounded-lg text-grey-2 bg-grey-10 shadow

navPopoverContainer.light: rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold text-white bg-grey-9 border border-grey-8 shadow
navPopoverContainer.dark: rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold text-grey-10 bg-white border border-grey-2 shadow

navTitle.light: text-{color}-1 font-bold hover:bg-grey-10 cursor-pointer px-2 py-1 rounded
navTitle.dark: text-grey-9 font-bold hover:bg-grey-2 cursor-pointer px-2 py-1 rounded

dayPopoverContainer.light: rounded text-xs text-white font-medium bg-grey-9 border border-grey-7 px-2 py-1 shadow
dayPopoverContainer.dark: rounded text-xs text-grey-10 font-medium bg-white border border-grey-2 px-2 py-1 shadow

datePickerInput: shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full py-2 px-3 text-grey-8 bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline
datePickerInputDrag: shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full py-2 px-3 text-grey-4 bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline
